data.title: Prescription Eyeglasses: Buy Optical Eyewear Online
data.meta_description: Boundless possibilities of shape, colour and design combined with unique lenses. ➔ Optimal visual comfort with Silhouette optical eyewear.
data.meta_site_name: Prescription Eyeglasses: Buy Optical Eyewear Online | Silhouette
data.text:
Optical eyewear used to be seen as a necessary measure, something you had to wear to see properly. But things have come a long way since then. Silhouette prescription glasses are much more than visual aids – they are high-quality accessories that prove that perfect vision and personal style can go hand in hand. Unparalleled lightness and an outstanding fit are the hallmarks of Silhouette’s men’s and women’s glasses. Now, you can look great, while enjoying a comfortable fit and clear vision all day long.

Silhouette’s prescription glasses are manufactured from durable, superior-quality materials. The glasses' frames are made from ultra-lightweight, high-tech titanium and Silhouette’s innovative SPX®+ which gives Silhouette glasses their signature lightness. Silhouette glasses’ frames are also cleverly designed without screws for maximum durability and a perfect fit. What’s more, they’re made from hypoallergenic materials. Customers can also choose from a wide selection of 23-carat gold plated eyeglass frames – the perfect choice if you’re looking for eyeglasses with a touch of glamour and style.

The Silhouette Vision Sensation® concept combines Silhouette’s premium eyeglass frames with top-quality bespoke lenses. The glasses' frames and lenses are developed, produced and assembled under one roof in Linz according to the strictest quality standards. Each pair of prescription glasses is expertly crafted with individual customer’s needs in mind. The result is tailor-made prescription glasses that offer maximum comfort and a superlative visual experience.

The Silhouette Panorama® occupational lenses are specially designed to enhance near and medium-range vision, making them the ideal eyewear solution for reading and at the office. Silhouette prescription glasses all have remarkably thin lenses. Your search is now over for super-lightweight eyeglasses that never compromise on style.

Silhouette prescription glasses are the perfect choice for customers who set the bar high for quality and design. The eyeglasses are defined by a stripped-back aesthetic that masterfully combines contemporary and timeless design, so there’s a Silhouette design to suit every taste.

Choose from a wide selection of prescription glasses in a range of frame designs.

Rimless glasses: perfect for fans of stylish, minimalist design who like to express their individuality. A wide array of frame colors can be combined with a variety of lens shapes.

Half-rim glasses: switch things up with a pared-down look that creatively combines rimless glasses and full-frame glasses.

Full-rim glasses: make a statement with highly individualized prescription glasses that accentuate your personal style.

Accent Rings: an innovative eyewear range that lets you mix and match the color of your glasses' frames with the shape and color of the Accent Rings which encircle the lenses. The Accent Rings are made from Silhouette’s innovative SPX+ ® material.

An array of Silhouette men’s and women’s glasses are available to choose from. Mix and match colors, finishes and lens shapes to create a look that is tailor-made for you. Silhouette’s extensive range of eyewear includes:

Aviator eyewear for the legendary pilot look

Iconic cat eye eyewear in classic and futuristic styles

Panto eyewear that add a modern twist to timeless design

Butterfly eyewear in elegant and trendy styles

Square eyewear for fans of clean-cut design

There is something to suit every taste and requirement among Silhouette’s dazzling collection of models, lens shapes, frame styles and colors. Once you’ve found the right pair for you, you can head to your nearest store or optician, which you can find via our retailer search.
